backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with localized types for quizzes, games, puzzles, sounds, and coloring templates, plus helper functions for language conversion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing missing translation‑key coverage and listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including pages, components, hooks, contexts, and translations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions with extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entrypoint with Android audio bridge detection, service worker registration, and script bootstrapping.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing app‑shell caching, stale‑while‑revalidate for assets, and offline navigation fallback.
frontend/README.md: Project README describing features, offline support, and Android audio bridge requirements.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapper managing navigation, age selection, providers, and background music control.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusicS: Empty component file placeholder for a background‑music selection modal.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationModal: Displays a celebration modal with confetti, sounds, and congratulatory messages for level or quiz completion.
frontend/src/components/coloring/Colorin: Implements a coloring canvas with brush tools, undo history, zoom, gestures, and template loading.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a decorative footer with animated icons and a privacy policy link.
frontend/src/components/games/LogicPuzzl: Runs a logic puzzle game with generated or backend puzzles, user input, scoring, and progression.
frontend/src/components/games/MathPuzzle: Math quiz game that generates age‑appropriate arithmetic problems and tracks score over a fixed number of questions.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryCard: Emoji‑based memory matching game using many possible themes, managing card flipping, matching, and completion.
frontend/src/components/games/ProblemSol: Multiple‑choice problem‑solving scenarios pulled from backend or fallbacks, tracking score across a set number of situations.
frontend/src/components/games/QuickReact: Fast‑paced reaction game where players tap the correct target within time limits across escalating rounds.
frontend/src/components/games/ShapeMatch: Shape‑matching puzzle that generates rule‑based shape pairs, shuffles them, tracks matches, and progresses levels.
frontend/src/components/games/SortingCla: Implements a drag-and-sort style game where children assign items to categories, tracking progress and completion based on remaining items.
frontend/src/components/games/VisualReco: Provides a find-the-differences game that generates random difference points, handles clicks, tracks found items, and completes when all differences are found.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with mascot, title, language selector, music controls, and home button.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a dropdown to switch the app’s language using flags and language names.
frontend/src/components/MusicControlsPop: Offers a popover to control background music, sound effects, and select music tracks.
frontend/src/config/audioConfig.ts: Defines detection logic for enabling Android-only audio mode using WebView bridge APIs and disables all web audio fallbacks.
frontend/src/contexts/AudioSettingsConte: Manages global mute settings for background music and sound effects with persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/contexts/BackgroundMusicCon: Stores and persists the selected background music track and exposes setters through React context.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Handles global language selection, persistence, and mapping to backend language enums.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refetches dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppBackgroundMusic: Controls background music playback with Android bridge detection, user-interaction gating, and prevention of redundant restarts.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundAudio.ts: Starts background audio only after user interaction and avoids restarting the same track unnecessarily.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication state using AuthClient, including loading, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks to fetch games, quiz questions, encouragement messages, and other content from the backend based on age group and language.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomizedQuizQues: Fetches a randomized set of quiz questions from the backend using React Query, keyed by age group, language, and count.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom variables, a child-friendly color palette, font settings, and utility animations.
Exports a list of background music option IDs with translation label keys for UI selection.
frontend/src/lib/coloringFallbackTemplat: Defines offline fallback coloring templates per age group, each referencing outline-only images suitable for children.
frontend/src/lib/dailySurprise.ts: Implements deterministic daily surprise game selection per age group using seeded randomness and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/lib/fallbackQuizQuestions.t: Contains extensive fallback quiz question pools in Turkish and English organized by age group.
frontend/src/lib/imageCache.ts: Empty file placeholder for image caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/localizedText.ts: Provides a helper to resolve a backend LocalizedText object into a string for a given UI language with English fallback.
frontend/src/lib/logicPuzzleFallback.ts: Provides fallback time-based puzzles in Turkish and English, selecting difficulty and content by age group.
Defines fallback problem-solving scenarios with options and correct answers, organized by age group and category.
frontend/src/lib/quizQuestionSelection.t: Implements quiz question selection with shuffling, history tracking, and repeat reduction using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/shapeMatchingRoundConfi: Generates shape‑matching round settings based on age group and level, adjusting pair counts, shape types, and rules.
frontend/src/lib/shapeMatchingRules.ts: Declares matching rules with evaluation logic and age requirements, and filters applicable rules by age group.
frontend/src/lib/sortingClassificationIt: Contains sorting/classification item pools and categories per age group for a categorization game.
frontend/src/lib/sortingClassificationSe: Provides item selection for the sorting/classification game with shuffling, repetition avoidance, validation, and localStorage history.
frontend/src/lib/sounds.ts: Defines canonical sound IDs and type guards for sound validation.
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: Exports language codes and a large dictionary of UI translations for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringZone.tsx: Displays coloring templates, handles loading, fallback templates, image errors, and renders the coloring canvas.
frontend/src/pages/GameZone.tsx: Loads available games, manages game selection and completion, and displays celebration UI.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows welcome screen, mascot, age selection, and navigation to games, quiz, or coloring.
frontend/src/pages/QuizZone.tsx: React quiz page that loads backend or fallback questions, supports language-aware selection/history, tracks progress, and handles UI flow and scoring.
frontend/src/services/audio.ts: Audio service managing SFX and background music with Android WebView bridges, mute states, validation, and web fallbacks.
frontend/src/types/androidBridge.d.ts: Type definitions for Android WebView audio bridges enabling background music and sound effects playback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, themes, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing multilingual issues, required fixes, and pending feature requests for global language updates across the app.
